context_of_use: This use case allows users to modify their account information to keep details current.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: To maintain accurate account details
description: This use case enables users to update their profile information to ensure their account details remain accurate.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User must be logged into the system.
postconditions: User's profile information is updated successfully.
assumptions: User has valid credentials to log in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
main_flow: 1. User selects the option to update profile → System displays the profile update form.
2. User enters new profile information → System validates the input.
3. User submits the updated information → System updates the profile and confirms the update.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): System detects invalid input → System displays an error message and prompts user to correct the input.
information_for_steps: 2. New profile information provided by the user.
